analyzed: 'khor lo'i don bsgom zhes bya ba ni 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: The “meditation on the meaning of the wheel” is stated as follows.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The practitioner of Vairocana, abiding in his own maṇḍala,

original: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge aom 'khor lo'i lte ba la bkod nas ma skyes pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis chos thams cad brtags pas sku'i bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge aom 'khor lo'i lte ba la bkod nas ma skyes pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis chos thams cad brtags pas sku'i bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Having arranged the syllable OṀ in the center of the wheel on the moon at one’s heart, one should do the recitation of the body by examining all phenomena with non-arising, freedom from conceptualization, and illusion-like-ness.

original: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje bltas nas rdo rje bzlas pa bya bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje bltas nas rdo rje bzlas pa bya bar gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, the recitation of the vajra is taught for the yoga of Akṣhobhya, by looking at the vajra situated in the center of the sun mandala in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽rdo rje dkyil 'khor @230a * //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / rdo rje dkyil 'khor @230a * //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “Vajra,” etc.

original: ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra mandala is the sun mandala.

original: rdo rje sngags don bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje sngags don bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the vajra mantra meaning.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rtog pa dang / 'chi ba dang bral ba chos thams cad ces bya ba'i don gsal ba byed pa ni rdo rje la yi ge h'um bsgoms nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rtog pa dang / 'chi ba dang bral ba chos thams cad ces bya ba'i don gsal ba byed pa ni rdo rje la yi ge h'um bsgoms nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “all phenomena” is clarified by the words “non-arising,” “freedom from conceptualization,” and “freedom from death.” The meaning is that one should do the vajra recitation by meditating on the syllable HŪṀ in the vajra.

original: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa yang rang gi yi shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i mtshan ma la rang gi yi ge bkod nas rang gi rnam par mos par rang gi bzlas pa bya zhes pa ni snying ga'i dbus su song ba rin chen zhes🔽bya bas rtog par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa yang rang gi yi shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i mtshan ma la rang gi yi ge bkod nas rang gi rnam par mos par rang gi bzlas pa bya zhes pa ni snying ga'i dbus su song ba rin chen zhes bya bas rtog par bya'o //
translated: This is to be understood by the one called Ratnasaṃbhava who has gone to the middle of the heart.

original: de yang gsungs pa'i cho gas shes par bya ste ma bshad do //
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa'i cho gas shes par bya ste ma bshad do //
translated: This should be understood by the rite that is taught, but it is not explained.

original: la la dag thig le'i sbyor ba 'dis bshad do zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: la la dag thig le'i sbyor ba 'dis bshad do zhes 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that this is explained by the yoga of the drop.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: snying gar yi ge aom bsams nas //
analyzed: snying gar yi ge aom bsams nas //
translated: Having visualized the syllable oṃ at the heart,

original: sngags kyi rnam par shes par bsgom //
analyzed: sngags kyi rnam par shes par bsgom //
translated: one should meditate on the mantra in the form of consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de le'u bcu gcig par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de le'u bcu gcig par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because this is stated in the eleventh chapter.

original: dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su //
translated: On all sides of the maṇḍala

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi logs bzhi rnams su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi logs bzhi rnams su'o //
translated: means on the four sides of the maṇḍalas of Vairocana and so on.

original: sangs rgyas lnga rnams zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga rnams zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The five buddhas

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhag pa ste /
translated: The arrangement of Vairochana, etc.

original: 'dis ni bdag po nges pa med par bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag po nges pa med par bstan to //
translated: This shows that the lord is not fixed.

original: 'od zer lnga ye bye brag gis //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga ye bye brag gis //
translated: By the particularities of the five lights,

original: zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa rnams kyi bye brag gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa rnams kyi bye brag gis so //
translated: means by the particularities of the mirror-like wisdom, etc.

original: de'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa spyan la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa spyan la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The assembly of deities of the mandala, such as Lochana, should be arranged in one part of that. This is the meaning of the phrase.

original: spros na byang chub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: spros na byang chub thob par 'gyur //
translated: If one recites, one will attain enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas te /
translated: Abiding in the center of the mandala circle,

original: ji ltar bar gsungs pa'i tshogs bzlas pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bar gsungs pa'i tshogs bzlas pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: as it is, one is blessed by the buddhas through the recitation of the assembly as it is taught.

original: bye brag rnam pa gnyis su grags //
analyzed: bye brag rnam pa gnyis su grags //
translated: It is renowned as having two particularities.

original: zhes bya ba ni rim dang cig car gyi bye brag gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rim dang cig car gyi bye brag gis so //
translated: This is by the particularities of the stage and instantaneous.

original: sku gsum rdo rje'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: sku gsum rdo rje'i bye brag gis //
translated: By the particularity of the three vajra bodies,

original: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i snying gar rang rang gi yi ge bkod pa de las sku gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi lha'i sku'i ngo bo spros nas rang gi gnas su gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i snying gar rang rang gi yi ge bkod pa de las sku gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi lha'i sku'i ngo bo spros nas rang gi gnas su gzhug par bya'o //
translated: This is the placement of the individual seed-syllable in the heart of Body- Vajra, etc. , and the emanation of the essence of the Body of the deity, which is the nature of the three bodies, and the entry into one's own place.

original: 'di nyid sku la sogs pa zhes pas gsungs pa //
analyzed: 'di nyid sku la sogs pa zhes pas gsungs pa //
translated: This is just what is said by the word Body, etc.

original: sku zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje sa bon du bshad de lta dang @230b sa bon dag bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje sa bon du bshad de lta dang @230b sa bon dag bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Body is explained as the seed of Body-Vajra, because of the non-distinction of seed and seed-syllable.

original: 'di skad du le'u bcu gcig par /
analyzed: 'di skad du le'u bcu gcig par /
translated: Thus it is said in the eleventh chapter:🔽Om is the supreme body of the Buddha,

original: aom ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog / a'a: ni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam //🔽h'um ni thugs kyi ye shes mchog /
analyzed: aom ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog / a'a: ni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam // h'um ni thugs kyi ye shes mchog /
translated: Ah is the path of the Buddha's speech,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Hum is the supreme knowledge of the Buddha's mind.

original: sku'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom sku rdo rje rnam pas spro ba dang bsdu bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sku'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom sku rdo rje rnam pas spro ba dang bsdu bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The essence of Body is the seed-syllable Om, which is to be known as the emanation and gathering by the aspect of Body-Vajra.

original: phyogs 'dis sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtogs par sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtogs par sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
translated: By this method, mind, etc. , are easy to understand, and so are not explained.

original: mchod na mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur //
analyzed: mchod na mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur //
translated: If one worships, one becomes a place of worship.

original: zhes bya ba ni spros nas sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams mchod par byas nas mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i ye shes mngon sum du bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spros nas sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams mchod par byas nas mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i ye shes mngon sum du bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that having emanated the vajra body and so forth, one should worship them, and then actualize the wisdom of high status and certain goodness.

original: la la dag sku la sogs pa bdag med pa bsgoms pas spro ba la sogs bya'o zhes /
analyzed: la la dag sku la sogs pa bdag med pa bsgoms pas spro ba la sogs bya'o zhes /
translated: Some assert that one should emanate and so on by meditating on the body and so forth as selfless.

original: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad par 'dod do //
analyzed: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad par 'dod do //
translated: They assert that body and so forth is explained by body and so forth.

original: mchod pa yang rang gi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis mchod par byed pa zhes sku la sogs pa zhes gsungs pa la la dag 'dod do //
analyzed: mchod pa yang rang gi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis mchod par byed pa zhes sku la sogs pa zhes gsungs pa la la dag 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that worship is performed by the goddesses of one's own clan.

original: de ltar mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras bus gdul bya rnams bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir du nad la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba spangs pa'i rgyu nyid dang / spyi dang cig shos kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang / zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi cho ga bshad par 'dod pas /
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras bus gdul bya rnams bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir du nad la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba spangs pa'i rgyu nyid dang / spyi dang cig shos kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang / zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi cho ga bshad par 'dod pas /
translated: Thus, in order to gather disciples by the result of the dharma of seeing, the cause of abandoning harm such as illness, the cause of accomplishing the common and uncommon siddhis, and the cause of explaining the rites of pacifying and so on,

original: zhi dang rgyas la sogs gang dang // de'am gzhan pa ci 'dod pa //
analyzed: zhi dang rgyas la sogs gang dang // de'am gzhan pa ci 'dod pa //
translated: whether that or something else,

original: 'khor lo rjes mnyes sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'khor lo rjes mnyes sbyor ba yis //
translated: if accomplished by the application of the wheel,

original: bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: it will be quickly accomplished.

original: zhes dgongs pas gsungs pas re zhig dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya //
analyzed: zhes dgongs pas gsungs pas re zhig dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga rnams bsgom par bya //🔽zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga rnams bsgom par bya // zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Meditate on the five vajras means meditate on the five buddhas.

original: dbus su bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: dbus su bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In the center, the lord and so on means this is stated:

original: rdo rje 'dzin ba chen po'am /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin ba chen po'am /
translated: Meditate on the lord of the wheel, either as Great Vajradhara

original: lhag pa'i lhas chog bzhin du bka'i 'khor lo'i bdag po bsgoms nas las 'di bya'o //🔽dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu //
analyzed: lhag pa'i lhas chog bzhin du bka'i 'khor lo'i bdag po bsgoms nas las 'di bya'o // dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu //
translated: or as the special deity, in accordance with the rite, and perform this rite.

original: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rjes su mthun par chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rjes su mthun par chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: In the four maṇḍalas means in the maṇḍalas of water and so on, in accordance with the rite.

original: kha dog bzhi zhes pa la ci rigs par kha dog dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan par yongs su brtags par bya'o //
analyzed: kha dog bzhi zhes pa la ci rigs par kha dog dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan par yongs su brtags par bya'o //
translated: The four colors should be imagined as having the color of white, etc., as appropriate.

original: @231a * // rdo rje bdud rtsi las gsungs pa //
analyzed: @231a * // rdo rje bdud rtsi las gsungs pa //
translated: It is stated in the Vajra Amṛta Tantra:

original: chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ni //
analyzed: chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ni //
translated: The water maṇḍala is round,

original: kha dog dkar po zhi ba la'o //
analyzed: kha dog dkar po zhi ba la'o //
translated: white in color, for pacifying.

original: sa ni gru bzhir gyur pa ste //
analyzed: sa ni gru bzhir gyur pa ste //
translated: The earth is square,

original: ser po de bzhin rgyas pa'i las //
analyzed: ser po de bzhin rgyas pa'i las //
translated: yellow in color, for increasing.

original: me ni gru gsum du ni 'gyur //
analyzed: me ni gru gsum du ni 'gyur //
translated: Fire is triangular,

original: nag po de ni gdug pa'i las //
analyzed: nag po de ni gdug pa'i las //
translated: black in color, for fierce activity.

original: rlung ni gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
analyzed: rlung ni gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
translated: Wind is shaped like a bow,

original: shin tu dmar po dbang la'o //
analyzed: shin tu dmar po dbang la'o //
translated: very red in color, for controlling.

original: zhes so // snying gar sngags kyi don bsgoms nas //
analyzed: zhes so // snying gar sngags kyi don bsgoms nas //
translated: Meditating on the meaning of the mantra at the heart,

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i nyams sngon du byas pa sngon du song bas bsgom pa nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i nyams sngon du byas pa sngon du song bas bsgom pa nyid de /
translated: having previously performed the experience of pacifying, etc., one meditates on the mantra.

original: bri ba la sogs pa sbyor ba gzhan la ma ltos pa'o //
analyzed: bri ba la sogs pa sbyor ba gzhan la ma ltos pa'o //
translated: This does not depend on other applications such as writing.

original: rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las //
analyzed: rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las //
translated: The four vajra activities

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnams ni de bzhin gshegs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnams ni de bzhin gshegs te /
translated: The vajras are the tathāgatas.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i las byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i las byed pa'o //
translated: He performs the four kinds of action, pacifying and so on.

original: gang gis she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gis she na gsungs pa /
translated: By what means? He says:

original: bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed //
translated: The one who has the vajra of meditation.

original: ces bya ba ni gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi chad par dus ring por goms bas legs par brtan pa'i sems rtse gcig par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi chad par dus ring por goms bas legs par brtan pa'i sems rtse gcig par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: The yogi who has made his mind one-pointed, well-established by long-term, uninterrupted, respectful practice.

original: gang gi sbyor ba las gang bya ba de gsungs pa /🔽zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul //
analyzed: gang gi sbyor ba las gang bya ba de gsungs pa / zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul //
translated: He says what action is to be done by what means:🔽For pacification, the aspect of Locana.

original: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dkar po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dkar po'o //
translated: The white Vairochana.

original: rgyas la rdo rje padmo can //
analyzed: rgyas la rdo rje padmo can //
translated: For increase, the vajra lotus-holder.

original: zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas ser po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas ser po'o //
translated: The yellow Amitabha.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rgyus rin chen 'byung ldan dmar po'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rgyus rin chen 'byung ldan dmar po'o //
translated: Vairochana is the red Ratnasambhava by the cause of engagement.

original: la la dag don yong grub par 'dod do //
analyzed: la la dag don yong grub par 'dod do //
translated: Some assert it is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de yang las sna tshogs pa byed par shes pa nyid kyis ma brjod do zhes pa 'di ni gzhan no //
analyzed: de yang las sna tshogs pa byed par shes pa nyid kyis ma brjod do zhes pa 'di ni gzhan no //
translated: And that is not stated by the knowledge of performing various actions. This is different.

original: rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra wrath is Akshobhya.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha thams cad kyi thun mong gi las yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha thams cad kyi thun mong gi las yin no zhes ston to //
translated: The phrase this and so forth indicates that this is the common activity of all the deities.

original: de la dang po re zhig shin tu snying rje'i yul gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir ma rungs pa'i las kyi yul gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la dang po re zhig shin tu snying rje'i yul gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir ma rungs pa'i las kyi yul gsungs pa /
translated: Among them, first of all, in order to destroy the suffering of the lower realms of those who are the objects of great compassion, the objects of the evil activity are stated:

original: ma dad smra ba zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa smra'o //
analyzed: ma dad smra ba zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa smra'o //
translated: Those who speak without faith are those who speak harmfully to the Three Jewels.

original: gang smod pa ni kha zer ba dang mtho ba tsams  pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gang smod pa ni kha zer ba dang mtho ba tsams  pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Those who slander are those who gossip and speak ill of others.

original: rdo rje can slob dpon zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon te /
analyzed: rdo rje can slob dpon zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon te /
translated: The vajra master is the vajra master.

original: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas te /
analyzed: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas te /
translated: He is the abode of the wisdom of omniscience.

original: de la rab tu smod pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de la rab tu smod pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: By merely slandering him, all roots of virtue are severed and all evil is embraced.

original: de @231b yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de @231b yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: slob dpon las gzhan bla ma min //
analyzed: slob dpon las gzhan bla ma min //
translated: There is no guru other than the master.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi snod bcud na //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi snod bcud na //
translated: In the three worlds, the environment and its inhabitants,

original: slob dpon las ni chen po med //
analyzed: slob dpon las ni chen po med //
translated: there is no greater master than the master.

original: gang la dad pa rnyed pa yis //
analyzed: gang la dad pa rnyed pa yis //
translated: By whomsoever faith is found,

original: dngos grub thams cad rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rnyed par 'gyur //
translated: all powers are found.

original: zhes so // gzhan rnams la zhes bya ba ni ma gsod pa la sogs pa'i sems can mang po la 'khu bar byed pa'i sems pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // gzhan rnams la zhes bya ba ni ma gsod pa la sogs pa'i sems can mang po la 'khu bar byed pa'i sems pa'o //
translated: “Others” refers to the thought of harming many beings, such as killing one’s mother, and so on.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad par bya'o //🔽rab tu bskul zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam tshig smra ba ste /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad par bya'o // rab tu bskul zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam tshig smra ba ste /
translated: “This” refers to what is to be explained.🔽“Fully implored” means that the tathāgatas are spoken to with pledges, just as they are.

original: sad par byed pa bskul par bshad //
analyzed: sad par byed pa bskul par bshad //
translated: “Implored” is explained as “awakened.”

original: ces bya ba'i tshig las so //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i tshig las so //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: “The sentient beings dwelling in the three realms”

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the object to be accomplished.

original: sangs rgyas sku rnams su zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku rnams su zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The buddha bodies”

original: kha sbyar dbye ba'i don du ji ltar ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su byas nas so //
analyzed: kha sbyar dbye ba'i don du ji ltar ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su byas nas so //
translated: means that, having become a perfect buddha, just as they are, for the sake of opening the mouth,

original: kha sbyar dbye ba byas nas su //
analyzed: kha sbyar dbye ba byas nas su //
translated: “having opened the mouth,

original: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa la sogs pa dang bral bar byas nas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa la sogs pa dang bral bar byas nas te /
translated: This is the instruction: having made the emanations, etc.,

original: de yang gsal par ma bshad do //
analyzed: de yang gsal par ma bshad do //
translated: and that is not clearly explained.

original: thams cad las ni rab tu 'grub //
analyzed: thams cad las ni rab tu 'grub //
translated: One should perform all the rites,

original: ces bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad la 'dis sngon du song bas bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad la 'dis sngon du song bas bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: all except for pacifying and increasing, by means of this, having gone before.

original: bka'i 'khor lo dgod par gsungs pa /
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo dgod par gsungs pa /
translated: The setting of the wheel of command is stated:🔽The four-spoked, etc.

original: kha bzhi pa zhes bya ba la dbus kyi rtse mo la phyogs bzhi'i rtse mo'i sbyor ba las so //
analyzed: kha bzhi pa zhes bya ba la dbus kyi rtse mo la phyogs bzhi'i rtse mo'i sbyor ba las so //
translated: four-spoked means the combination of the four spokes in the middle spoke.

original: 'dis ni gral rim bzhin dgag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni gral rim bzhin dgag pa'o //
translated: This is the prohibition in order.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa sngon du bsgoms pas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa sngon du bsgoms pas /
translated: As for Vajrasattva, etc., having meditated on Vajradhara as before,

original: rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa yongs su gyur pa las shin tu khros pa'i mi bskyod pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa yongs su gyur pa las shin tu khros pa'i mi bskyod pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on Akshobhya in a state of great wrath, arisen from the transformation of the five-spoked vajra.

original: des phyung ba sngon du song bas lha'i dkyil 'khor yang de dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: des phyung ba sngon du song bas lha'i dkyil 'khor yang de dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Having gone before, having arisen from that, one should imagine the mandala of deities in the same way.

original: dus gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three times, etc.

original: lag pa g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i lag pa g-yas par yi ge h'um las byung ba 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i lag pa g-yas par yi ge h'um las byung ba 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The right hand is the right hand of Akṣobhya, which is visualized as a vajra arisen from the syllable hūṃ, blazing.

original: de yang le'u bco lnga par /
analyzed: de yang le'u bco lnga par /
translated: And that is stated in the fifteenth chapter:

original: yi ge h'um ni 'bar bcas pa //
analyzed: yi ge h'um ni 'bar bcas pa //
translated: The syllable hūṃ, blazing,

original: rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom //
translated: is the vajra, visualized as blazing.🔽It is said to be the family of Vajrapāṇi,

original: gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa yi //🔽phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su brjod //🔽ces gsungs so //🔽sangs rgyas 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi dus @232a * //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa yi // phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su brjod // ces gsungs so // sangs rgyas 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi dus @232a * //
translated: which conquers all evildoers.

original: gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa ste de'i bdag nyid yin la de'i phyir /
analyzed: gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa ste de'i bdag nyid yin la de'i phyir /
translated: The wheel of buddhas is the three times, as many as the atoms in all buddhafields, of buddhas dwelling there, and he is of their nature.

original: stobs po che ni shin tu bzlog par dka' ba'o //🔽yang na sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo ni /
analyzed: stobs po che ni shin tu bzlog par dka' ba'o // yang na sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo ni /
translated: Therefore, he is Mahābala, very difficult to overcome.

original: dkyil 'khor pa'i gzugs kyis stobs po che'i zhes khyad par te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa'i gzugs kyis stobs po che'i zhes khyad par te /
translated: Or else, the wheel of buddhas is the form of the maṇḍala, and he is Mahābala, distinguished by that.

original: de'i thogs pa med pa'i nus pas de nges par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i thogs pa med pa'i nus pas de nges par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: by the unimpeded power of that, one should ascertain it.

original: bka' bsgo ba'i de ma thag tu gsungs pa /
analyzed: bka' bsgo ba'i de ma thag tu gsungs pa /
translated: Immediately after the command, he says:

original: sems can rnams zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems can rnams zhes bya ba la /
translated: with regard to sentient beings

original: sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis //
translated: by the variety of Buddha-bodies

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so //
translated: means by the variety of Vairocana, etc.

original: gong bu'i tshul gyis so zhes bya ba ni gcig gi rnam pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: gong bu'i tshul gyis so zhes bya ba ni gcig gi rnam pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: in the manner of a collection means by the application of the form of one.

original: slar yang spro ba rab tu bya //
analyzed: slar yang spro ba rab tu bya //
translated: Again, one should radiate

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sangs rgyas khros pa rnams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sangs rgyas khros pa rnams te /
translated: and so forth refers to the angry Buddhas.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i gzugs rnams gzhig pa'i ched du de rnams spro bar bya ba'i ched du gsungs so //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i gzugs rnams gzhig pa'i ched du de rnams spro bar bya ba'i ched du gsungs so //
translated: In order to destroy the forms as explained, he says that they should be radiated.

original: 'di ni kha sbyar dbye ba dang 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir gsal bar ma byas so//
analyzed: 'di ni kha sbyar dbye ba dang 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir gsal bar ma byas so//
translated: This is not clearly stated because it is connected with the separation of the embrace.

original: gang 'dir bsgrub par bya ba'i rig pa bcad pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / dngos grub 'phrog pa la sogs pa ni gsal bar ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'dir bsgrub par bya ba'i rig pa bcad pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / dngos grub 'phrog pa la sogs pa ni gsal bar ma byas pa ste /
translated: Here, the cutting of the knowledge being, the striking with the dagger, the stealing of the powers, and so forth, are not clearly explained.

original: de ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: That should be known from the guru's instructions.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With buddha and so forth,

original: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: buddha is Vajradhara.

original: de nyid chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi dam tshig go //
translated: That itself is the commitment of the nature of the dharmakāya, and so forth.

original: de nyid sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus nyid kyi phyir rdo rje gsum gyi gnas ni dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de nyid sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus nyid kyi phyir rdo rje gsum gyi gnas ni dkyil 'khor te /
translated: That itself is the place of the three vajras, the maṇḍala, because of being the body blessed by the vajra body, and so forth.

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu gsungs //🔽zhes pa'i tshig las so //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu gsungs // zhes pa'i tshig las so //
translated: It is said, the maṇḍala of the body.🔽With the deluded one, and so forth,

original: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mi 'dod pa'i las byed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mi 'dod pa'i las byed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: the deluded one is the object to be accomplished, who performs unwanted actions.

original: sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: Even the buddhas cannot accomplish him.

original: zhes bya bas ni srung ba la sogs pas slar 'tsho bar mi nus pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni srung ba la sogs pas slar 'tsho bar mi nus pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: With cannot be revived, and so forth, it is said that the one who cannot be revived by protection and so forth is the remainder.

original: 'dis ni sbyor ba'i bdag nyid che ba gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni sbyor ba'i bdag nyid che ba gsungs pa'o //
translated: This teaches the greatness of the application.

original: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra commitment is Akṣobhya.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la bka' bsgo bas bka' 'khor lo de nyid ming gang la yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la bka' bsgo bas bka' 'khor lo de nyid ming gang la yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That very wheel of command, which is the command to the Tathāgatas, etc., is the samādhi that has that name.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas kyang bka'i 'khor lo bya bar nye bar bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas kyang bka'i 'khor lo bya bar nye bar bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach that the wheel of command is also to be performed by the application of Vairochana, etc., he says:

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes @232b bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes @232b bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Adorned with blazing vajras means

original: khro bo'i 'od zer rnams 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i 'od zer rnams 'phro ba'o //
translated: that the light rays of the wrathful ones radiate.

original: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
translated: Meditate on Vairochana means

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'khor lo las byung ba khros pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'khor lo las byung ba khros pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that one should meditate on oneself as the wrathful Vairochana arisen from the wheel in the retinue located in one’s maṇḍala. This is the meaning.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one called “Greatly Famed Vajrasattva” means that one should visualize the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas of the maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can //
analyzed: rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can //
translated: “The vajra with sparks shooting out”

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bzhin du khro bo thams cad du bcug pas mi phyed par gyur pa'i 'khor lo 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bzhin du khro bo thams cad du bcug pas mi phyed par gyur pa'i 'khor lo 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: means that one should visualize the wheel with light rays, which has become indivisible by inserting all the wrathful ones as before.

original: sems can rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sems can rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Sentient beings” and so forth.

original: 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyogs thams cad na gnas pa cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba la btang nas shin tu khros pas dgug pa'i 'od zer gyi sbyor bas rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyogs thams cad na gnas pa cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba la btang nas shin tu khros pas dgug pa'i 'od zer gyi sbyor bas rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having sent forth all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas abiding in all directions to accomplish the rite, one should draw them in with the wrathful one’s light ray yoga and insert them into one’s own body.

original: spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi //
analyzed: spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi //
translated: “The emanation of all vajras”

original: zhes bya ba ni yang de rnams shin tu khros pas spros nas ji lta ba bzhin bka' bsgo ba byin nas bya ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yang de rnams shin tu khros pas spros nas ji lta ba bzhin bka' bsgo ba byin nas bya ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, having become very angry, they should be emanated, and having been commanded as before, they should be applied to the action.

original: bka' bsgo ba'i tshig gsungs pa /
analyzed: bka' bsgo ba'i tshig gsungs pa /
translated: The words of the command are stated:

original: gson zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gson zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni go sla'o //
translated: The words “live” and so forth are easy to understand.

original: 'di ni thams cad kyi thun mong gi tshigs su bcad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad kyi thun mong gi tshigs su bcad pa yin te /
translated: This is the verse common to all,

original: 'on kyang mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: 'on kyang mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i bye brag gis so //
translated: but by the distinction of grasping the sign.

original: 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin zhes gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin zhes gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter with the vajra-holder of the wheel.

original: khro bo'i sbyor bas kyang 'di bya bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: khro bo'i sbyor bas kyang 'di bya bar gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that this should be done with the application of wrath:

original: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In “vajra space” and so forth,

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can //
translated: the vajra-holder of the buddha maṇḍala

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad bdag po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad bdag po'o //
translated: is Vairocana, the lord.

original: 'khor lo che zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rang gi lhag pa'i lha gshin rje gshed por blta'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo che zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rang gi lhag pa'i lha gshin rje gshed por blta'o //
translated: The great wheel is the wrathful assembly, and one should see one’s own special deity as Yamāntaka.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In “buddha” and so forth,

original: sngar gyi bzhin du mtshan ma byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: sngar gyi bzhin du mtshan ma byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: As before, one should bless the syllables, and so on.

original: 'on kyang h'um yig las bskyed pa'i rdo rje tho ba 'dir bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang h'um yig las bskyed pa'i rdo rje tho ba 'dir bsam par bya'o //
translated: However, one should imagine the vajra hammer generated from the syllable hūṃ.🔽This is the supreme vajra maṇḍala,

original: 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje khro bo thams cad de /
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje khro bo thams cad de /
translated: means all vajra wrathful ones.

original: de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor 'di lta bur shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor 'di lta bur shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And one should understand that they are like this maṇḍala.

original: thams cad las @233a * //
analyzed: thams cad las @233a * //
translated: One should not transgress any of them.

original: mi 'da' ba nyid kyi phyir dam tshig ni gshin rje gshed po ste /
analyzed: mi 'da' ba nyid kyi phyir dam tshig ni gshin rje gshed po ste /
translated: The pledge is the lord of death, Yama.

original: de gang las byung ba zhes bya ba ni sa bon la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de gang las byung ba zhes bya ba ni sa bon la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
translated: From where does he arise? From the seed, and so on.

original: de yang gshin rje gshed po'i sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de yang gshin rje gshed po'i sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: And that is the samādhi that has the nature of the body, and so on, of the lord of death.

original: bka'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i cho ga 'dis drag shul bsgrub pa dang bgegs bskrad pa la yang blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i cho ga 'dis drag shul bsgrub pa dang bgegs bskrad pa la yang blta bar bya ste /
translated: One should understand that this rite of turning the wheel of command is also for the fierce rite and for driving away obstructors.

original: 'di nye bar dgod pa gsungs pa sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /🔽'jigs pa skyes pa la sogs pa la yang ji lta ba bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad bdag la bsdu ba dang / khro bo'i rnam par ston nas /
analyzed: 'di nye bar dgod pa gsungs pa sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te / 'jigs pa skyes pa la sogs pa la yang ji lta ba bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad bdag la bsdu ba dang / khro bo'i rnam par ston nas /
translated: The statement this is taught is stated by the word body, etc.

original: bgegs thams cad gzhig pa'i phyogs bcur bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad gzhig pa'i phyogs bcur bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Even when fear arises, etc., one should abide in the center of the maṇḍala with the yoga of Vairocana, etc., and, as before, gather all the Tathāgatas, etc., into oneself, and, displaying the form of wrath, one should meditate on the ten directions in order to destroy all obstructors.

original: ye shes mchog gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes mchog gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The statement the supreme wisdom vajra means the yogin of one-pointed mind, that is the meaning.

original: gsungs pa / h'um mdzad yang na gtsug tor ram //
analyzed: gsungs pa / h'um mdzad yang na gtsug tor ram //
translated: It is stated: Humkara, or uṣṇīṣa,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs nyid //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs nyid //
translated: or Vairocana, etc.,

original: khro bo 'khor lo gnas bsrung phyir //
analyzed: khro bo 'khor lo gnas bsrung phyir //
translated: one should imagine the wrathful one abiding in the maṇḍala,

analyzed: gzhal yas khang bsgoms nas de la gdan brtag par bya'o //

original: gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad sku //
analyzed: gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad sku //

original: chos kyi sku ste khyad par med //
analyzed: chos kyi sku ste khyad par med //

original: rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag gyur //

original: rdo rje'i @233b sku ni bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje'i @233b sku ni bla na med //

analyzed: ces gsang pa'i thig le las gsungs pa de kho na nyid bltas nas brtan par bya ste /

original: rdo rje'i nga rgyal bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i nga rgyal bya ba ni /

analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya'o //

original: 'og na gnas pa'i chu gnon pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'og na gnas pa'i chu gnon pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //

analyzed: gang gi gang la bdag por 'gyur pa des de nyid la zhabs kyis mnan par bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: gang rnams kyi de med pa ni de rnams kyi bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi lha zhes bya ba'i don to//

analyzed: yang na dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i rim gyis so //

original: 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /

analyzed: phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas sems brtan por byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang gi tshe chu la 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /

translated: then, having performed the yoga of one’s chosen deity beforehand, by the power of cultivating the recollection of the Buddha, having understood all the subtle particles of water to be the nature of the sugatas, one’s own self is also ascertained in that way, observing equality.

original: de ltar sprul pa'i rgyal ba'i dbu la zhabs 'dor ba'i rim gyis chu la bcag pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sprul pa'i rgyal ba'i dbu la zhabs 'dor ba'i rim gyis chu la bcag pa'i rim pa'o //

original: 'gyod pa spangs pa zur gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'gyod pa spangs pa zur gyis gsungs pa /

original: dag rengs par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: dag rengs par bya ba gsungs pa /

analyzed: dbang chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /

original: gang gi tshe ngag 'phrog par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ngag 'phrog par 'dod pa de'i tshe /

translated: by the application of any yellow-colored deity, the moon at the root of the tongue arises from A, and the yellow maṇḍala of Maheśvara is accomplished, peaceful, marked with three-pronged vajras in the corners.

analyzed: rdo rje'i rva yang rna ba gnyis dang lce dang / rkan phug nas byung bar blta bar bya'o //

original: de yang kha thur du bltas nas ltung ba dbyangs yig gi mtha' ma las byung ba sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa kha dog ser po'i khro bos mgo bo la mnan pa zug gzer dang ldan pa spobs pa med par bsgom par bya'o //

translated: That, facing downward, is fallen, standing on a variegated vajra arising from the last vowel, yellow in color, with a wrathful one pressing on the head with the foot, with pain, without eloquence, one should meditate.

original: dbung gnon pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: dbung gnon pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: rnams so // 'di skad gsungs pa yin te / rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog ser po khro por dmigs nas spros te skyes bu dpa' bo rnams so so la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi stan la sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du g-yon
translated: This is what is being said:🔽Having visualized the wrathful ones with yellow complexions just as they are, emanating from one’s own maṇḍala abiding in one’s own maṇḍala, the heroes should meditate on being pressed down by the heroes with the seat of the maṇḍala of great Acala on a crossed vajra above the multicolored vajra, standing with the left leg

analyzed: rmongs pa 'am 'chi bar bsgoms na de bzhin du de 'gyur ro //

translated: By the yoga of the white, peaceful deity that is desired, one should meditate on a five-pronged vajra arisen from the syllable hūṃ, blazing with garlands of flames like the fire at the end of the eon, standing upright, covering the city, etc., standing in the sky, blazing

translated: The light rays from the vajra purify all the diseases of sentient beings who are harmed by disease, etc., and then return and reabsorb into the vajra.🔽

analyzed: ces bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi 'od @234b zer rnams kyis te 'od zer ser po rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The light rays of Akṣobhya, blue in color, are like the light of the lapis lazuli.🔽The light rays of Vairocana, white in color, are like the light of the moon.

analyzed: chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang //

original: ji lta ba bzhin du de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par byas nas yang de rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis spros pas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par byas nas yang de rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis spros pas dbang bskur te /

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du byas te lus rgyas pa'o//

original: nor rgyas pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: nor rgyas pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: For the sake of wealth, it is said:

analyzed: yang kun nas rin po che'i char te der bsam mo zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //

analyzed: de'i gnas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: dus ring por nad la sogs pas nye bar 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba'i dgongs pa dang ldan pas gsungs pa /
translated: With the intention that for a long time there will be no harm from disease, etc., it is said:

original: sangs rgyas sprin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The cloud of Buddhas, etc.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Buddha is Vairochana.

original: chos ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: chos ni snang ba mtha' yas so //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje'o //

original: der zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la'o //

analyzed: spro ba zhes bya ba ni de'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: bsam gtan 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of this meditation,

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bar med pa'i spro ba dang / bsdu ba'i rim gyis thun bzhir byin gyis brlab pa'o //

analyzed: gang la gang du yang dag par spyod pa'o //

analyzed: 'dis ni nges par bshad par bya ba'i srung ba'i chogs gsungs so //

analyzed: sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Buddha's blessing means

analyzed: bgegs med pa'i phyir myur bar dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that all powers will be quickly attained, because there will be no obstacles.

original: las thams cad la bsrung ba sngon du song bas 'jug pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: las thams cad la bsrung ba sngon du song bas 'jug pa gsungs pa /
translated: The engagement in all actions preceded by protection is stated:

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid steng du gnas pa 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rnam pa ni rdo rje phur bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid steng du gnas pa 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rnam pa ni rdo rje phur bu'o //
translated: In the Vajra Amṛta, etc., the Amṛtakuṇḍali itself is above, and below is in the form of a single-pointed vajra, which is the Vajra Stake.

original: phyogs bcur dkyil 'khor gdab par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcur gnas pa'i @235a * //
analyzed: phyogs bcur dkyil 'khor gdab par bya // zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcur gnas pa'i @235a * //
translated: One should strike the maṇḍala in the ten directions.

original: bgegs dang log 'dren 'khor dang bcas pa'i lus la ji lta ba bzhin du gdab po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bgegs dang log 'dren 'khor dang bcas pa'i lus la ji lta ba bzhin du gdab po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should strike the bodies of the obstructors and misleaders who reside in the ten directions, together with their retinues, just as they are.

original: nad 'byung ba zhi bar bya ba'i don dang yul srung ba la sogs pa'i don du 'di yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: nad 'byung ba zhi bar bya ba'i don dang yul srung ba la sogs pa'i don du 'di yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: This should also be seen for the purpose of pacifying the arising of disease, and for the purpose of protecting the country, and so forth.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul //
analyzed: zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul //
translated: For pacification, the method of the eyes.

original: zhes bya ba'i rgyas par bstan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rgyas par bstan pa gsungs pa /
translated: The extensive explanation of this is stated:

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: zhi bar byed pa ni zhi ba ste /
analyzed: zhi bar byed pa ni zhi ba ste /
translated: Pacification is that which pacifies.

original: de'i don gyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i don gyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The maṇḍala for that purpose

original: yi ge bam las byung ba chu //
analyzed: yi ge bam las byung ba chu //
translated: is the water arisen from the syllable vaṃ.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: snying gar 'dod pa gzhag ces bya ba la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: snying gar 'dod pa gzhag ces bya ba la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The statement one should place the desired object at the heart is as follows.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas /🔽aom dzin dzik che ge mo sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas / aom dzin dzik che ge mo sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: Having remained on the water mandala in the body mandala through the yoga of Vairochana,

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas pa na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas pa na /
translated: one should recite the mantra Oṃ jina jik such-and-such-śāntiṃ kuru svāhā.

original: rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar zla ba la zhi bar 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par bsams nas /
analyzed: rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar zla ba la zhi bar 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined the moon at the heart of the gnosis being just as one desires for pacification,

original: de'i snying ga'i zla ba la /
analyzed: de'i snying ga'i zla ba la /
translated: one should visualize the mantra garland on the moon at its heart.

original: aom ru ru sphu ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyi phreng ba mgo gyen du gnas pa dgod do //
analyzed: aom ru ru sphu ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyi phreng ba mgo gyen du gnas pa dgod do //
translated: The mantra garland is the mantra Oṃ ruru sphuru and so on, with the heads of the letters facing upward.

original: de las byung ba spyan gyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi rig pa 'don pa sngon du song ba'i dbang bskur ba ster ba lhur byed pa nam mkha' yongs su gang ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba spyan gyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi rig pa 'don pa sngon du song ba'i dbang bskur ba ster ba lhur byed pa nam mkha' yongs su gang ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the host of eyes that arise from that bestow the empowerment preceded by the recitation of the awareness.

original: de nas de rnams bsdus nas ye shes bdud rtsi'i 'od kyi gzugs kyis gcig tu byas nas nad pa'i lus la tshim par bya ba'i don du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de rnams bsdus nas ye shes bdud rtsi'i 'od kyi gzugs kyis gcig tu byas nas nad pa'i lus la tshim par bya ba'i don du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, having collected them, one should cause them to enter the body of the patient for the purpose of satisfying him with the form of the light of the nectar of intuition.

original: yang de rnams de'i ba spu'i bu ga nas sangs rgyas sprin gyi gzugs zhi ba dkar po'i gzugs rnams spros nas dbang ster ba sngon du song ba ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pas nad pa de'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: yang de rnams de'i ba spu'i bu ga nas sangs rgyas sprin gyi gzugs zhi ba dkar po'i gzugs rnams spros nas dbang ster ba sngon du song ba ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pas nad pa de'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
translated: Again, having caused those to enter through the pores of his body in the form of white peaceful forms of the cloud of Buddhas, one should make the patient of the same nature as those who have entered, having previously conferred initiation.

original: man ngag brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: man ngag brjod par bya ste /
translated: The esoteric instruction is to be stated:

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dkar por bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dkar por bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on Vairocana, who has entered into the concentration of liberation, naturally radiant, as white, abiding in his own mandala.

original: de'i shes rab kyi chu skyes kyi nang du bcug pa'i bsgrub bya'i mgo bo las kyi rdo rje las byung ba kha ba bzhin du grang ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis nad la sogs pa'i dri ma ma lus pa spangs par bltas nas de nas gdon par bya ste
analyzed: de'i shes rab kyi chu skyes kyi nang du bcug pa'i bsgrub bya'i mgo bo las kyi rdo rje las byung ba kha ba bzhin du grang ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis nad la sogs pa'i dri ma ma lus pa spangs par bltas nas de nas gdon par bya ste
translated: Having visualized that the stream of nectar, which is cold like snow, arises from the karma vajra at the head of the one to be accomplished, who is placed in the lotus of his wisdom, and that all the impurities such as disease are removed without exception, then one should extract the nectar.

original: / dkar po'i dri bzang po dang / gos dang byug pas mdzes @235b pa'i lus kyang mdun du dkyil 'khor dkar po la bzhag nas ji lta ba bzhin du spros te /
analyzed: / dkar po'i dri bzang po dang / gos dang byug pas mdzes @235b pa'i lus kyang mdun du dkyil 'khor dkar po la bzhag nas ji lta ba bzhin du spros te /
translated: Having placed the body, which is beautiful with white fragrance, clothes, and ointments, in front on a white mandala, one should emanate it as before.

original: spyan la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur bar bya ba'am /
translated: The assembly of Locanā and so forth should confer empowerment.

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nad pa'i mgo bo la gnas pas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang byin pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi dgra sbre'u'i rnam pa lta bu phyung bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nad pa'i mgo bo la gnas pas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang byin pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi dgra sbre'u'i rnam pa lta bu phyung bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should imagine that the Tathāgata, residing on the head of the one who is ill, bestows empowerment as before, and that the enemy of various diseases is expelled in the form of a bee.

original: phyi rol gyi yang gro ga la sogs pa rnams la tsandan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis ji lta ba bzhin du phyir bzlog pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo bris nas chog bzhin du rdzogs par byas nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod de /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi yang gro ga la sogs pa rnams la tsandan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis ji lta ba bzhin du phyir bzlog pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo bris nas chog bzhin du rdzogs par byas nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod de /
translated: Also, externally, on birch bark, etc., one should draw with white sandalwood and saffron the protection wheel in the reverse order, and having completed it in the proper manner, one should worship it with flowers, etc.

original: kham phor kha sbyar nas nad pa'i sngags kyi gnas su'am /
analyzed: kham phor kha sbyar nas nad pa'i sngags kyi gnas su'am /
translated: Having placed it in a covered bowl, in the place of the mantra of the patient,

original: gzhan sa phyogs gtsang ba'i gnas su bzhag la me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod do //
analyzed: gzhan sa phyogs gtsang ba'i gnas su bzhag la me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod do //
translated: or in another clean place, one should worship it with white flowers three times a day.

original: 'dis ni nges par nyi ma bdun gyis zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni nges par nyi ma bdun gyis zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will certainly be pacified in seven days.

original: rgyas pa'i dbang gu byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyas pa'i dbang gu byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Having performed the rite of increase, it is said:

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: 'dir yang zhi ba bzhin du cho ga yin te /🔽'on kyang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa kha dog ser po snang ba mtha' yas kyi sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhi ba bzhin du cho ga yin te / 'on kyang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa kha dog ser po snang ba mtha' yas kyi sbyor ba'am /
translated: Here, the rite is like that of pacification.🔽However, one should visualize oneself as Amitābha, yellow in color, standing in the maṇḍala of great wind,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor bas /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor bas /
translated: or as Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka che ge mo pustim ku ru h'um zhes bya ba'am /🔽rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sngags bzlas pas sngon bzhin du rang gi rig pa las byung ba gos dkar mo ser mo'i tshogs kyis bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i bum pa ser po lag na thogs pas dbang bskur bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pas kyang dbang bskur ba gsungs
analyzed: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka che ge mo pustim ku ru h'um zhes bya ba'am / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sngags bzlas pas sngon bzhin du rang gi rig pa las byung ba gos dkar mo ser mo'i tshogs kyis bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i bum pa ser po lag na thogs pas dbang bskur bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pas kyang dbang bskur ba gsungs
translated: One should recite the mantra Oṃ āḥ ārolikā, cause so-and-so to forget, hūṃ,🔽or the mantra of Ratnasaṃbhava, as before.

original: pa / ba spu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: pa / ba spu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: One should imagine that one is empowered by a host of yellow Pāṇḍaravāsinīs arisen from one's own awareness, who hold yellow vases filled with nectar in their hands, and that the Tathāgatas also confer empowerment, as stated in the lines beginning The pores of whose body are clouds of jewels.🔽As for the line The pores of whose body are clouds of jewels,

original: rin chen sprin zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor bas rgyas par byed pa'i de'i tshe /
analyzed: rin chen sprin zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor bas rgyas par byed pa'i de'i tshe /
translated: when one is performing the rite of enriching by means of the yoga of Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: rin chen bdag po'i sprin spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen bdag po'i sprin spro bar bya'o //
translated: one should emanate clouds of jewel lords.

original: gang gi tshe yang snang ba mtha' yas kyi sbyor bas byed pa de'i tshe chos kyi sprin ser po'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang snang ba mtha' yas kyi sbyor bas byed pa de'i tshe chos kyi sprin ser po'o //
translated: When one is performing the rite by means of the yoga of Amitābha, one should emanate yellow clouds of Dharma.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the host of Amitābha.

original: yid bzhin nor bu'i dpal ldan 'gyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu'i dpal ldan 'gyur //
translated: One becomes glorious like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du nor rgyas pa rnyed pas ser sna med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du nor rgyas pa rnyed pas ser sna med pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because of the absence of miserliness due to the acquisition of wealth just as it is,

original: ci 'dod pa'i don ster bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci 'dod pa'i don ster bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it bestows the desired aim, is the meaning.

original: dbang du byed pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
analyzed: dbang du byed pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
translated: With regard to enthrallment, it is stated:

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs @236a * //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs @236a * //
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: pa la / rdo rje zla gam dkyil 'khor bsam //
analyzed: pa la / rdo rje zla gam dkyil 'khor bsam //
translated: The vajra half-moon mandala is imagined.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dmar po zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam las byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dmar po zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam las byung ba'o //
translated: The color is red, the form is like a half-moon, the wind mandala arises from yam.

original: de yang rdo rje bdud rtsi las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje bdud rtsi las gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is stated in the Vajra Amṛta Tantra:

original: rlung ni gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
analyzed: rlung ni gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
translated: The wind is in the shape of a bow.

original: dbang la shin tu dmar por 'dod /
analyzed: dbang la shin tu dmar por 'dod /
translated: For enthrallment, it is considered to be very red.

original: ces so // rdo rje nam mkha' chos mchog gzugs //
analyzed: ces so // rdo rje nam mkha' chos mchog gzugs //
translated: The vajra is the supreme dharma of space, the form.

original: zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: This is Amoghasiddhi.

original: la la dag snang ba mtha' yas su 'dod do //
analyzed: la la dag snang ba mtha' yas su 'dod do //
translated: Some assert it is Amitābha.

original: 'od zer sna lnga'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lnga'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the five light rays,

original: der ni gzi brjid dbab par bya //
analyzed: der ni gzi brjid dbab par bya //
translated: there, one should cause splendor to descend.

original: zhes bya ba la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du don yod grub pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ye shes sems dpa' dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du don yod grub pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ye shes sems dpa' dang ldan pa /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Amoghasiddhi, just as it is on the red wind mandala,

original: rang gi snying gar bsgrub par bya ba bsgoms nas //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar bsgrub par bya ba bsgoms nas //
translated: one should visualize the one to be accomplished in one’s heart.

original: de'i snying gar bkod pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags las byung ba'i sgrol ma'i tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: de'i snying gar bkod pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags las byung ba'i sgrol ma'i tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur nas /
translated: Having conferred initiation upon him in accordance with the rite by a host of Tārās arisen from the mantra of Ārya Tārā placed in his heart,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba bya ste /
translated: the Tathāgatas also should confer initiation in the same way.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang yang thob pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang yang thob pa zhes bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should say that he has also obtained the initiation of the Tathāgatas.

original: dga' ba rgyas par byed pa'i phyir rin chen dam tshig sgrol ma ste /
analyzed: dga' ba rgyas par byed pa'i phyir rin chen dam tshig sgrol ma ste /
translated: The pledge of jewel Tārā is for the purpose of expanding joy,

original: dbang du byed pa la gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang du byed pa la gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is preeminent in enthralling.

original: de'i sprin gyi tshogs ni tshogs so //
analyzed: de'i sprin gyi tshogs ni tshogs so //
translated: Her cloud-host is a host.

original: de'i bkod pa ste ji lta ba bzhin du dbang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i bkod pa ste ji lta ba bzhin du dbang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Its arrangement, that is, the special emanation of the Tathagata, is just as it is for the purpose of the empowerment.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi that focuses on that is also called that.

original: sngar gyi mngon spyod dang 'brel ba'i las gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngar gyi mngon spyod dang 'brel ba'i las gsungs pa /
translated: The action connected with the previously mentioned destructive rite is stated:

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
translated: In the vajra of space, and so on,

original: zhes bya ba ni ram las byung ba gru gsum pa'i nag po mi bzod pa'i 'bar bas khyab pa la bsgrub bya gnas par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ram las byung ba gru gsum pa'i nag po mi bzod pa'i 'bar bas khyab pa la bsgrub bya gnas par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the abode of the fire mandala means that the victim is made to abide in the triangle arisen from RAM, which is black and pervaded by unbearable flames.

original: rang gi don dang nyes pa chung ba rnams la las 'di bya ba ma yin par gsungs pa gnod byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi don dang nyes pa chung ba rnams la las 'di bya ba ma yin par gsungs pa gnod byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This action is not to be done for those whose purpose is one's own or who have little negativity. It is stated in the harm-doer, and so on. This is what is said:

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa la /
translated: to all the Buddhas, and so on,

original: gnod pa byed pa la ji lta ba bzhin du kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa byas nas ji ltar gsungs pa me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa la ji lta ba bzhin du kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa byas nas ji ltar gsungs pa me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
translated: Having opened the mouth and so on, just as in the case of the harm doer, one should perform the rite of the fire mandala as taught.🔽

original: gcer bu sgra bshig @236b pa 'bru mar gyis byugs pa shin tu 'dar ba skyob pa med pa mdun du bltas nas /
analyzed: gcer bu sgra bshig @236b pa 'bru mar gyis byugs pa shin tu 'dar ba skyob pa med pa mdun du bltas nas /
translated: Having done such things as separating the mouth and the navel of the one who is to be harmed, one should visualize him as described, naked, with his hair disheveled, smeared with oil, trembling, without protection, facing oneself,🔽and cut up and eaten by the rākṣasas and so forth that emerge from the light rays that emerge from one’s pores.

original: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ba'i 'od zer las byung ba'i srin po la sogs pa rnams kyis gtubs shing za bar bsgoms na 'dir 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za'o //
analyzed: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ba'i 'od zer las byung ba'i srin po la sogs pa rnams kyis gtubs shing za bar bsgoms na 'dir 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za'o //
translated: If one does this, there is no doubt that he will die.

original: thams cad du 'di las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i sems dang / khro bo'i lta stangs la sogs pa nges par bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad du 'di las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i sems dang / khro bo'i lta stangs la sogs pa nges par bya ste /
translated: In all cases, one should definitely have a mind that is in accord with the action, and a wrathful gaze, and so forth.

original: gang bco brgyad pa las /
analyzed: gang bco brgyad pa las /
translated: As the Aṣṭasāhasrikā says,

original: zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya //
analyzed: zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya //
translated: For pacification, one should do it with a mind of pacification.

original: rgyas pa la ni rgyas pa'i yid //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni rgyas pa'i yid //
translated: For increase, with a mind of increase.

original: dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya //
analyzed: dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya //
translated: For power, with a mind of desire.

translated: Holding various weapons means holding the weapons of the five gnoses. The remaining ones hold the emblems of the Tathagatas. This is the meaning.

original: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid rim @237a * //
analyzed: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid rim @237a * //

original: gsum gyi / bye brag gis thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir phyogs 'dis lha thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan nges par rtogs pa ste tha dad pa ni ma yin no //🔽de la 'du shes kyi phung po'i bdag nyid ni ngag rdo rjes tshor ba dang 'du byed ngag gi ngo bo nyid /

translated: Because everything is included by the three, by this method, the root hand-symbol of all deities is ascertained, and there is no difference.🔽Among them, the nature of the aggregate of perception is speech-vajra, and the nature of feeling and formation is Ratnasaṃbha-va and Amoghasiddhi, because they are mental factors.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan dang / don yod grub pa dag ste sems las byung ba nyid kyi phyir chos kyi khams nyid kyis bsdu'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan dang / don yod grub pa dag ste sems las byung ba nyid kyi phyir chos kyi khams nyid kyis bsdu'o //
translated: They are included by the element of mental objects alone.

original: yul dang dbang po dag rnam par dag par grub pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo'i phyir sku rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs kyi phung por bsdu'o //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dag rnam par dag par grub pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo'i phyir sku rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs kyi phung por bsdu'o //
translated: The nature of body-vajra is the aggregate of form, because it is the nature of form that is accomplished by the purification of the sense-fields and sense-faculties.

original: 'di yang gsungs pa chos mngon pa las /
analyzed: 'di yang gsungs pa chos mngon pa las /
translated: This is also stated in the Abhidharma:

analyzed: thams cad gcig gis bsdus pa ste // phung po skye mched ngag dang ni //
translated: Everything is included by one,🔽By the nature of the aggregates, sense-fields,

original: khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //

original: zhes kha cig 'dod do //
analyzed: zhes kha cig 'dod do //

original: sems las byung ba ni sems kyi 'khor lo yin pa'i phyir sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin dag sems kyi nang du 'dus so //
analyzed: sems las byung ba ni sems kyi 'khor lo yin pa'i phyir sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin dag sems kyi nang du 'dus so //
translated: The mental factors are included within the mind, because they are the retinue of the mind.

original: lhag ma rang gi rigs kyi nang du 'dus zhes gzhan zer ro //
analyzed: lhag ma rang gi rigs kyi nang du 'dus zhes gzhan zer ro //
translated: The remaining ones are included within their own class, say others.

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang / mi bskyod pa yin pa'i yang phyir nam mkha'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang / mi bskyod pa yin pa'i yang phyir nam mkha'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of space is called the eye, because it is naturally luminous, and because it is Akṣhobhya.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes de rang gi 'byor ba khyer bar byed pa de m'a ma k'i ste de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes de rang gi 'byor ba khyer bar byed pa de m'a ma k'i ste de la de skad ces bya'o //

original: gsung gi rdo rje'i go 'phang thob par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje'i go 'phang thob par byed pa ste /

analyzed: gsung rdo rje ma ni gos dkar mo'o //

original: takki'i rgyal po'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: takki'i rgyal po'i khyad par ro //

original: shes rab la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis ma gtogs pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis ma gtogs pa shes par bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje phyag ni drug par bsgom // zhes bya bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One should understand that the six hands of Vajrapani🔽are as described in the Vajrapani Sadhana.

analyzed: ral gri zhags pa bsnams zhes bya ba ni las kyi tshogs la brten pa'i mi g-yo ba'i khyad par ro //

analyzed: gtsor bsgom pa la ni khro bo thams cad kyi lag pa g-yas pa'i gnyis pa na rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: ser po dang dmar po dag gi g-yon dkar po'o //

translated: Takkirāja, Acala, Uṣṇīṣacakravartin, Sumbha, and Hūṃkāra have jeweled crowns, slightly bared fangs, and are of a form that is graceful with good ornaments.

analyzed: gzhan ni mche ba gtsigs pa la sogs pa'i zhal dang klus brgyan pa shin tu 'jigs su rung ba bsgom par ya'o //

analyzed: yi ge gcig ces bya ba ni bhr'um las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: bsam gtan dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni srung ba'i 'khor lo'i rnam par gzhag pa'am /
translated: The meditative stabilization maṇḍala is the arrangement of the protection wheel or

analyzed: bdag po'i gzugs kyis so //

original: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: Supreme gnosis means

analyzed: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: the vajra that is the nature of the five gnoses.

original: de 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is held,

original: gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Sumbha is the holder of supreme gnosis.

analyzed: rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i lha yang 'dir bshad pa'i cho gas bsgom par bya ba grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gzi brjid phung po'o //

analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi gnod pa'i gtsug tor gang la yod pa de rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ro //

analyzed: gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can // zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: gtsug tor chen po dang rmad du byung ba'i gtsug tor can la sogs pa rnams so //

analyzed: dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyis // zhes bya ba ni /
